short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the top 10 cryptocurrencies and their USD value.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay ahead in the cryptocurrency market with Crypto Tracker! This Chrome extension offers real-time tracking of the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market cap, displaying their current USD values for quick insights. Whether you're a seasoned trader or a crypto enthusiast, Crypto Tracker provides reliable, up-to-date information to help you make informed decisions. With its user-friendly interface and seamless updates, you'll never miss out on the latest trends in the crypto world. Perfect for anyone looking to keep a close eye on their favorite digital assets.
